attributes.action: establish two new bank holidays to fall in line with the annual celebration of pancakes and the annual celebration of gunpowder.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Shrove Tuesday and Guy Fawkes Night are to one and all the highlights of the Gregorian calendar. On no other night do the British public come together in such jovial harmony. Therefore we believe it is only right that these occasions gain the respect they deserve and are each awarded a day of national holiday to mark the passing of two truly British events.
